2006-01-23

Bloggies - voting time is here

The voting form for the Sixth Annual Weblog Awards aka The Bloggies is now online so it's time to go and vote for...

  • The ever wonderful and enlightening Chromewaves in the Best Canadian weblog category

  • Said the Gramophone is a tremendous read and so has rightfully got a nomination in the Best writing of a weblog category. Go read this fantastic/funny/sweet piece on Camera Obscura and then go vote!
